name: Mothman Prophet
description: A greater Mothman that has mastered the art of prophecy. Can foresee and cause disasters, weakening enemies with visions of their demise.

abilities.name: Prophecy
abilities.description: Marks an enemy with death prophecy; if below threshold, they die.

abilities.name: Disaster Sight
abilities.description: Reveals an area and curses all enemies within.

abilities.name: Wing Dust
abilities.description: Releases prophetic scales that slow and confuse enemies.

abilities.name: Calamity
abilities.description: Calls down a prophesied disaster at target location.
